scripts.build: npm -w shared run build && npm -w backend run build && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.build:render:backend: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend
scripts.build:render:frontend: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.dev: npm -w shared run build && concurrently -n SHARED,BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green,magenta "npm -w shared run dev" "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:prisma: npm -w shared run build && concurrently -n SHARED,BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green,magenta "npm -w shared run dev" "npm -w backend run dev:prisma" "npm -w frontend run dev"
